title: Artificial womb technology breaks its 4 minute mile

title_detail.value: Artificial womb technology breaks its 4 minute mile

summary: A major advancement in pioneering technology based around the use of an artificial womb to save extremely premature babies is being hailed as a medical and biotechnological breakthrough.

summary_detail.value: A major advancement in pioneering technology based around the use of an artificial womb to save extremely premature babies is being hailed as a medical and biotechnological breakthrough.
